mapper.select: SELECT stats_name statsName, stats_value statsValue, stats_date statsDate, stats_type statsType FROM TB_STATISTICS WHERE stats_type = #{statsType} AND use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY stats_date ASC

SELECT stats_date statsDate, total_order_count totalOrderCount, pending_count pendingCount, paid_count paidCount, preparing_count preparingCount, shipping_count shippingCount, delivered_count deliveredCount, executed_at executedAt FROM TB_ORDER_STATISTICS WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY executed_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ORDER_STATISTICS ( stats_type, stats_date, total_order_count, pending_count, paid_count, preparing_count, shipping_count, delivered_count, total_sales_amount, executed_at ) SELECT 'DAY', CURDATE(), COUNT(DISTINCT O.order_id), COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN O.order_status = 'PENDING' THEN O.order_id END), COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN O.order_status = 'PAID' THEN O.order_id END), COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN O.order_status = 'PREPARING' THEN O.order_id END), COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN O.order_status = 'SHIPPING' THEN O.order_id END), COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN O.order_status = 'DELIVERED' THEN O.order_id END), IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN P.status = 'PAID' THEN O.total_price ELSE 0 END), 0), NOW() FROM TB_ORDER_MST O LEFT JOIN TB_PAYMENT_MST P ON O.order_id = P.order_id WHERE O.reg_dtime >= CURDATE() ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_order_count = VALUES(total_order_count), pending_count = VALUES(pending_count), paid_count = VALUES(paid_count), preparing_count = VALUES(preparing_count), shipping_count = VALUES(shipping_count), delivered_count = VALUES(delivered_count), total_sales_amount = VALUES(total_sales_amount), executed_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(DATEDIFF(upd_dtime, reg_dtime)), 1), 0) as avg_delivery_time, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status = 'D_SHIPPING' THEN 1 END) as current_shipping, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status != 'COMPLETE' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), reg_dtime) >= 3 THEN 1 END) as delay_count FROM TB_DELIVERY WHERE use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(ship_to_addr), 1, 2) as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM TB_DELIVERY WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND ship_to_addr IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRIM(ship_to_addr), 1, 2) ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(upd_dtime, '%m-%d') as date, COUNT(*) as count FROM TB_DELIVERY WHERE delivery_status = 'COMPLETE' AND upd_dtime >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(upd_dtime, '%m-%d') ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status = 'READY' THEN 1 END) as READY, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status IN ('L_SHIPPING', 'L_WH') THEN 1 END) as L_SHIPPING, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status IN ('ABROAD', 'IN_CUSTOMS', 'C_DONE') THEN 1 END) as ABROAD, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status = 'D_SHIPPING' THEN 1 END) as D_SHIPPING, COUNT(CASE WHEN delivery_status = 'COMPLETE' THEN 1 END) as COMPLETE FROM TB_DELIVERY WHERE use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STATISTICS (stats_name, stats_value, stats_date, stats_type, use_yn) SELECT '일일배송완료', COUNT(*), CURDATE(), 'DELIVERY', 'Y' FROM TB_DELIVERY WHERE delivery_status = 'COMPLETE' AND DATE(upd_dtime) = CURDATE() ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stats_value = VALUES(stats_value)
mapper.select: SELECT acc_status as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM TB_USERS GROUP BY acc_status
SELECT app_status as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM TB_USERS GROUP BY app_status
SELECT SUBSTR(TRIM(address), 1, 2) as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM TB_USERS WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND address != '' GROUP BY SUBSTR(TRIM(address), 1, 2)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STATISTICS (stats_name, stats_value, stats_date, stats_type, use_yn) SELECT '활성사용자수', COUNT(*), CURDATE(), 'USER', 'Y' FROM TB_USERS WHERE acc_status = 'ACTIVE' ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stats_value = VALUES(stats_value)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_products, COUNT(CASE WHEN curr_stock_vol < safe_stock_vol THEN 1 END) as low_stock, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(reg_dtime) = CURDATE() THEN 1 END) as today_new FROM TB_OIL_MST WHERE use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT fuel_cat_cd as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM TB_OIL_MST WHERE use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY fuel_cat_cd
SELECT fuel_nm as name, curr_stock_vol as value FROM TB_OIL_MST WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY curr_stock_vol DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_STATISTICS (stats_name, stats_value, stats_date, stats_type, use_yn) SELECT '전체재고량', SUM(curr_stock_vol), CURDATE(), 'PRODUCT', 'Y' FROM TB_OIL_MST WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stats_value = VALUES(stats_value)
